title: Inside the Crown: Secrets of the Royals
overview: Using rarely-seen footage and revealing historical documents, Inside the Crown: Secrets of the Royals tells the inside story of Queen's reign from the Coronation to the present. Â Historians, eyewitnesses, and royal insiders offer new insights on the pivotal moments in the Queen's life, with intriguing revelations about the real woman behind the Crown.The series provides fresh insight from historians, biographers, royal insiders and the wider family along with eyewitnesses who all contribute to a new intimate portrait of the Queen and her family at key moments.
